name: Greedy Man
description:
This game takes play in a solo 1st person suspenseful mystery game designed for PC. You are a wealthy business owner invited to a ball/party at a competitor’s mansion along with other upper-class citizens in the area. Being the sneaky and greedy businessman, you are you decide the only reason you’ll go is because you know he keeps their company’s secret recipe somewhere there

The creation of this game was primarily focused on the level design. What I balanced in creating this game in relation to design was that I wanted every room to feel necessary to gameplay, there is not a room that is a waste of time for exploring.

All sound effects sourced from freesound.org

All art sourced from the Unity Asset Store
